text: The term Interdict may refer to: ==Religion== * Interdict, an ecclesiastical penalty which (temporarily) bars a specific person or group of people from receiving the sacraments ==Legal== * Court order enforcing or prohibiting a certain action * Injunction, such as a restraining order (see also Interdictum) * Interdiction (law enforcement) activity: to forbid (someone) from doing something, or to forbid (an action or thing) by formal or legal sanction. (See also Interdiction) ==Military== * Interdiction, to attack enemy resupply lines. ** Air interdiction, a military tactic sl:Interdikt
title: Interdict (disambiguation)
